properties.media:imagetext:
WINE LIST
CHAMPAGNE
RED WINES
Chaileau Bramaire
Cuvée William Deutz 1996
The 1996 Cuvée William Deutz is powerfull
and complex. It is extraordinarily pure with
complexity, which is the hallmark of the Cuvee
William Deutz. With strong personality, this
charming wine also shows all the finesse of the
1996 vintage. It is a good aperitif and also
complements light dishes and Asian dishes.
WHITE WINES
Château Branaire-Ducru 1996, 4ème Cru Classé
Château Branaire-Ducru, an elegant Grand Cru
wine from the Saint Julien of Haut Medoc.
Bordeaux, offers beautiful floral, raspberry, and
blackcurrant characters with a mineral note and
well-integrated fine tannins. It is delicate and
fleshy. It goes perfectly with all kinds of red
meat and most of the Chinese stewed dishes.
LOUIS MAX
PuLIgnY-MONTRACHET
Puligny Montrachet Les Grandes Marches 2002
This elegant wine is produced from 100%
Chardonnay grapes, hand picked from the
vinevard located. at the centre or Cote de
Beaune, Burgundy. It is complex and rich,
with characters of honey, white flowers,
buttery bread and minerals, and a lingering
finish. Enjoy this delicious wine with our
seafood or fish dishes.
Corton Grand Cru Louis Max 1996
Produced from 100% Pinot Noir grapes, this
powerful and elegant Grand Cru wine comes
from the Côte de Beaune area of Burgundy. It
has a deep and intense ruby red colour and
offers concentrated aromas of red and black
fruits balanced beautifully with vanilla wood
flavourst matches well with most roast meatl
dishes.
Frankland River Chardonnay 2002
This elegant and well structured white wine
comes from the Frankland River region in the
south of Western Australia. It displays vibrant
aranefruit aromas with distinctive mineral
undertones. The palate has an abundance of
citrus and melon flavours with integrated oak
and lively acidity. This is a wine with area
finesse that can be enjoyed with fish, chicken
Tignanello 2000
Tiananello, the original Super-Tuscan, is
produced from 80% Sangiovese, 15% Cabernet
Sauvianon and 5% Cabernet Franc. Its
vinification practices set the example for a new
breed of exceptional top-of-the-line Italian wine.
The 2000 Tignanello is complex and elegant. It
is full bodied, layered with intense black fruit
flavours and hints of wood characters. This
cunerh wine is best enioved with casserole
dishes or any roast meats.
CX SIGNATURE DRINKS
PORT
CATHAY DELIGHT
A Kiwifruit based non-alcoholic
drink with coconut ivice and d
touch of fresh mint.
PACIFIC SUNRISE
A refreshing combination of
champagne and brambuie with
the zest of orange and lemon.
Ramos Pinto Quinta da Ervamoira 10 Year Old
Tawny Port
Produced from grapes grown in the vineyard
Quinta da Ervamoira, this tawny offers all the
maturity of an aged wine while still displayinal
the vigour of youth. It is smooth and full
bodied, with aromas and flavours of apricot
and num balanced with vanilla scents trom the
aged casks.
APERITIFS AND COCKTAILS
Campari • Martini Rosso • Martini Extra Dry •
Harvevs Bristol Cream Sweet Sherry • La Ina
Dry Sherry • Gordons Dry Gin • Stolichnaya
Russian Vodka • Bloody Mary • Screwdriver
WHISKIES
Chivas Regal 12 Years Old
Iohnnie Walker Blue Label
Glenfiddich Ancient Reserve Single Malt Whisky
Gentleman lack Bourbon
Canadian Club
COGNAC
Hennessy XO
LIQUEURS
Grand Marnier • Cointreal • Drambuie e
Kahlua • Bailey's Irish Cream
BEER
International Selection
Cathay Pacific aims to offer a diverse selection of wines on board - but
apologies if on some flights a certain wine is not available. Our crew
will always be happy to recommend an alternative.
